org.mundo.net
Interface ISerialize

All Known Implementing Classes:
BinSerializationHandler, BinSerializerBundle, XMLSerializationHandler
public interface ISerialize

The basic interface for serializer/deserializer-bundles.

Method Summary

          Deserializes a message.

Method Detail

serialize

void serialize(Message msg)
               throws java.io.IOException
Serializes a message.

Parameters:
msg - a message containing a number of chunks. A chunk can either be a map containing a passive object tree or a blob containing binary data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

deserialize

                 throws java.io.IOException
Deserializes a message.

Parameters:
msg - a message containing blobs with the serialized data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

deserializeObject

java.lang.Object deserializeObject(java.io.InputStream r)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Deserializes an object.

Parameters:
r - a reader providing the serialized data.
Returns:
the deserialized object.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
